pageTitle: Re: iPad2 Optimum Import Resolution: Mobile Photography Talk Forum: Digital Photography Review
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {5866=This issue is absurd. I can add that the iTunes import on the new iPad is 1936*1288. Importing through Dropbox results in the same. I've found the "best" method to getting Canon 40d 10mpx high resolution files onto the tablet is Gmail. Yes email.}
